ModuleDescription: Provides processors for rendering BCC and FCC volumes.

Processor.name: BCCVolumeRaycaster
Processor.Description: Raycaster similar to SingleVolumeRaycaster for BCC volumes.

Processor.name: FCCVolumeRaycaster
Processor.Description: Raycaster similar to SingleVolumeRaycaster for FCC volumes.

Processor.name: VolumeInterleave
Processor.Description: Interleaves intensity with pre-calculated volume gradients for BCC and FCC raycasting.
